text: Bake and cool the pie crust.  Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Separate the eggs. Add the sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, lemon zest and 2 egg yolks to a mixing bowl. Mix well. (Reserve the remaining 2 egg yolks for another use). Pour the egg mixture into the baked and cooled pie shell.  Beat the 4 egg whites with the sugar until stiff peaks form. Pile the meringue over the pie filling. Bake until golden brown.
